sentences.expr: Let  $\bm{r}_{\bm{I}}=\{r_{1},,r_{N}\}$  be the set of  $N$  images regions extracted from  $\bm{I}$
sentences.label: definition

sentences.expr: When generating an entity word in the caption, we want to ground it in a specific image region  $r\in\bm{r}_{\bm{I}}$
sentences.label: usecase

sentences.expr: A visual word  $y^{vis}$  is a type of word that is grounded in a specific image region drawn from  $\bm{r}_{\bm{I}}$
sentences.label: usecase

sentences.expr: The  softmax  normalizes the vector  $\bm{u}^{t}$  to be a distribution over grounding regions  $\bm{r}_{\bm{I}}$
sentences.label: usecase

sentences.expr: $\bm{P}_{\bm{r}}^{t}$  is the probability distribution over grounding regions  $\bm{r}_{\bm{I}}$  and visual sentinel  $\tilde{r}$
sentences.label: definition
